cobblemon.species.aerodactyl-mega.desc: When it Mega Evolves, it becomes more vicious than ever before. Some say that's because its excess of power is causing it pain.
cobblemon.species.alakazam-mega.desc: Having traded away its muscles, Alakazam's true power has been unleashed. With its psychic powers, it can foresee all things.
cobblemon.species.beedrill-mega.desc: Its legs have become poison stingers. It stabs its prey repeatedly with the stingers on its limbs, dealing the final blow with the stinger on its rear.
cobblemon.species.blastoise-mega.desc: The cannon on its back is as powerful as a tank gun. Its tough legs and back enable it to withstand the recoil from firing the cannon.
cobblemon.species.charizard-megax.desc: The overwhelming power that fills its entire body causes it to turn black and creates intense blue flames.
cobblemon.species.charizard-megay.desc: Its bond with its Trainer is the source of its power. It boasts speed and maneuverability greater than that of a jet fighter.
cobblemon.species.gengar-mega.desc: It tries to take the lives of anyone and everyone. It will even try to curse the Trainer who is its master!
cobblemon.species.gyarados-mega.desc: Mega Evolution also affects its brain, leaving no other function except its destructive instinct to burn everything to cinders.
cobblemon.species.kangaskhan-mega.desc: The explosive energy the child is bathed in causes temporary growth. The mother is beside herself with worry about it.
cobblemon.species.mewtwo-megax.desc: Psychic power has augmented its muscles. It has a grip strength of one ton and can sprint a hundred meters in two seconds flat!
cobblemon.species.mewtwo-megay.desc: Despite its diminished size, its mental power has grown phenomenally. With a mere thought, it can smash a skyscraper to smithereens.
cobblemon.species.pidgeot-mega.desc: With its muscular strength now greatly increased, it can fly continuously for two weeks without resting.
cobblemon.species.pinsir-mega.desc: The influence of Mega Evolution leaves it in a state of constant excitement. It pierces enemies with its two large horns before shredding them.
cobblemon.species.slowbro-mega.desc: All the energy from Mega Evolution poured into the Shellder on its tail, leaving Slowpoke to be swallowed whole.
cobblemon.species.venusaur-mega.desc: In order to support its flower, which has grown larger due to Mega Evolution, its back and legs have become stronger.
cobblemon.species.ampharos-mega.desc: Massive amounts of energy intensely stimulated Ampharos's cells, apparently awakening its long-sleeping dragon's blood.
cobblemon.species.heracross-mega.desc: A tremendous influx of energy builds it up, but when Mega Evolution ends, Heracross is bothered by terrible soreness in its muscles.
cobblemon.species.houndoom-mega.desc: Its red claws and the tips of its tail are melting from high internal temperatures that are painful to Houndoom itself.
cobblemon.species.scizor-mega.desc: It stores the excess energy from Mega Evolution, so after a long time passes, its body starts to melt.
cobblemon.species.tyranitar-mega.desc: Due to the colossal power poured into it, this Pokémon's back split right open. Its destructive instincts are the only thing keeping it moving.
cobblemon.species.steelix-mega.desc: The iron it ingested with the soil it swallowed transformed its body and made it harder than diamonds.
cobblemon.species.sceptile-mega.desc: The leaves growing on Sceptile’s body are very sharp edged. This Pokémon is very agile and it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
cobblemon.species.blaziken-mega.desc: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.
cobblemon.species.swampert-mega.desc: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
cobblemon.species.rayquaza-mega.desc: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.
cobblemon.species.medicham-mega.desc: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.
cobblemon.species.latios-mega.desc: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
cobblemon.species.latias-mega.desc: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.
cobblemon.species.gardevoir-mega.desc: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.
cobblemon.species.camerupt-mega.desc: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years or whenever it becomes really angry.
cobblemon.species.altaria-mega.desc: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you’re in a dream.
cobblemon.species.aggron-mega.desc: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don’t take it lightly.
cobblemon.species.gallade-mega.desc: When trying to protect someone, it extends its elbows as if they were swords and fights savagely.
cobblemon.species.abomasnow-mega.desc: They appear when the snow flowers bloom. When the petals fall, they retreat to places unknown again.
cobblemon.species.audino-mega.desc: Its auditory sense is astounding. It has a radarlike ability to understand its surroundings through slight sounds.
cobblemon.species.diancie-mega.desc: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
cobblemon.species.absol-mega.desc: It converts the energy from Mega Evolution into an intimidating aura. Fainthearted people expire from shock at the sight of it.
cobblemon.species.banette-mega.desc: Extraordinary energy amplifies its cursing power to such an extent that it can't help but curse its own Trainer.
cobblemon.species.glalie-mega.desc: The excess energy from Mega Evolution spilled over from its mouth, breaking its jaw. It spews endless blizzards.
cobblemon.species.manectric-mega.desc: Mega Evolution fills its body with a tremendous amount of electricity, but it's too much for Manectric to fully control.
cobblemon.species.mawile-mega.desc: It has an extremely vicious disposition. It grips prey in its two sets of jaws and tears them apart with raw power.
cobblemon.species.metagross-mega.desc: Mega Evolution stimulated its brain. It emerged as a ruthless Pokémon that will clutch at any means of ensuring its victories.
cobblemon.species.sableye-mega.desc: Bathed in the energy of Mega Evolution, the gemstone on its chest expands, rips through its skin, and falls out.
cobblemon.species.salamence-mega.desc: The stress of its two proud wings becoming misshapen and stuck together because of strong energy makes it go on a rampage.
cobblemon.species.sharpedo-mega.desc: The spines sprouting from its head are transformed fangs. If they're injured or broken off, the spines will regenerate countless times.
cobblemon.species.garchomp-mega.desc: Excess energy melted its arms and wings, transforming them into giant scythes.
cobblemon.species.lopunny-mega.desc: It swings its ears like whips and strikes its enemies with them. It has an intensely combative disposition.
cobblemon.species.lucario-mega.desc: Bathed in explosive energy, its combative instincts have awakened. For its enemies, it has no mercy whatsoever.
cobblemon.species.arceus-bug.desc: Where all creation was born, that is the being's place of origin.
cobblemon.species.arceus-dark.desc: Two make matter, and three make spirit, shaping the world.
cobblemon.species.arceus-dragon.desc: Three beings were born to bind time and space.
cobblemon.species.arceus-electric.desc: The third being raged, raining down bolts of anger.
cobblemon.species.arceus-fairy.desc: The Original One is in all things. The Original One is nowhere at all. From all creations, over all creations, does the Original One watch over all.
cobblemon.species.arceus-fighting.desc: Three beings whose power can hold both time and space fixed. The rift is born of disorder on the other side of this world.
cobblemon.species.arceus-fire.desc: The power of defeated giants infuses this Plate.
cobblemon.species.arceus-flying.desc: The being poured the remains of its power into stone and buried it deep.
cobblemon.species.arceus-ghost.desc: The other side of this world was given by the Original One to its raging third.
cobblemon.species.arceus-grass.desc: The powers of Plates are shared among Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.arceus-ground.desc: When the universe was created, its shards became this Plate.
cobblemon.species.arceus-ice.desc: Two beings of time and space set free from the Original One.
cobblemon.species.arceus-poison.desc: The rules of time and space change within the opposite world.
cobblemon.species.arceus-psychic.desc: The Original One breathed alone before the universe came.
cobblemon.species.arceus-rock.desc: It gathers power from the Plates, listening for the flute's song.
cobblemon.species.arceus-steel.desc: That which fills the other side of the world can shape the rage and mold it.
cobblemon.species.arceus-water.desc: The rightful bearer of a Plate draws from the Plate it holds.
cobblemon.species.silvally-bug.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to bug type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-dark.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to dark type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-dragon.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to dragon type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-electric.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to electric type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-fairy.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to fairy type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-fighting.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to fighting type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-fire.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to fire type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-flying.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to flying type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-ghost.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to ghost type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-grass.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to grass type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-ground.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to ground type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-ice.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to ice type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-poison.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to poison type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-psychic.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to psychic type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-rock.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to rock type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-steel.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to steel type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.silvally-water.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to water type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.battle.weather.primordialsea.s: A heavy rain began to fall!
cobblemon.battle.weather.primordialsea: A heavy rain began to fall!
cobblemon.battle.fieldactivate.deltastre: The strong winds are protecting Flying-type Pokémon!
cobblemon.battle.weather.deltastream.upk: The strong winds continue to protect Flying-type Pokémon!
cobblemon.move.zconfuseray.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1.
cobblemon.move.zmirrormove.desc: Raises Attack by 2 stages, calls a Z-move.
cobblemon.move.zconversion.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zsketch.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zcurse.desc: Fully restores user's HP if Ghost-type, Raises Attack by 1 stage if non Ghost-type.
cobblemon.move.zsleeptalk.desc: Boosts critical-hit ratio by 2 stages, calls a Z-move
cobblemon.move.ztrickortreat.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zforestscurse.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zgeomancy.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zhappyhour.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zcelebrate.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zholdhands.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.zpurify.desc: Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.battle.damage.gulpmissile: %1$s threw the Arrokuda on the foe
cobblemon.battle.activate.gmaxcentiferno: %1$s became trapped in the fiery vortex!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.gmaxvinelash: %1$s vines were placed on the battlefield!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.gmaxsteelsurg: Spikes were scattered on the ground all around %1$s team!
cobblemon.battle.ultra: %1$s has regained its true power through Ultra Burst!
cobblemon.pokedex.minior-meteor.desc: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing its body grows too heavy.
cobblemon.pokedex.minior.desc: It eats dust in the atmosphere. The composition of the dust determines the color of its core.
cobblemon.battle.activate.powerconstruct: You sensed the presence of many
cobblemon.species.deoxys-attack.desc: This Deoxys has transformed into its aggressive guise. It can fool enemies by altering its appearance.
cobblemon.species.deoxys-defense.desc: When it changes form, an aurora appears. It absorbs attacks by altering its cellular structure.
cobblemon.species.deoxys-speed.desc: A Pokémon that mutated from an extraterrestrial virus exposed to a laser beam. Its body is configured for superior agility and speed.
cobblemon.species.hoopa-unbound.desc: It is said to be able to seize anything it desires with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.
cobblemon.species.rotom-heat.desc: A form in which Rotom lurks within a strange cauldron. The cauldron's origin is unknown. A bothersome Pokémon, causing trouble with the flames it spits.
cobblemon.species.rotom-wash.desc: A form in which Rotom lurks within an odd bureau. The bureau's purpose is unknown. A bothersome Pokémon, causing trouble by splashing cold water everywhere.
cobblemon.species.rotom-frost.desc: A form in which Rotom lurks within a bizarre cupboard. The cupboard's composition is unknown. A bothersome Pokémon, causing trouble by frosting everything over.
cobblemon.species.rotom-fan.desc: A form in which Rotom lurks within a mysterious contraption. The contraption's purpose is unknown. A bothersome Pokémon, causing trouble by stirring up powerful winds.
cobblemon.species.rotom-mow.desc: A form in which Rotom lurks within a misshapen wheelbarrow. The wheelbarrow's mechanisms are bizarre. It's a bothersome Pokémon, causing trouble by mowing down grass and trees.
cobblemon.species.necrozma-duskmane.desc: Necrozma has attached itself to Solgaleo. It siphons away its host's limitless energy, exploiting that energy to fuel a rampage.
cobblemon.species.necrozma-dawnwings.des: When Necrozma latches on to Lunala, it becomes vicious, seeing enemies everywhere it looks. It will burn the world with lasers.
cobblemon.species.calyrex-ice.desc: It's said that this Pokémon once moved a large forest—and all the Pokémon living there—to a new location overnight.
cobblemon.species.calyrex-shadow.desc: Legend says that by using its power to see all events from past to future, this Pokémon saved the creatures of a forest from a meteorite strike.
cobblemon.species.kyurem-white.desc: It has foreseen that a world of truth will arrive for people and Pokémon. It strives to protect that future.
cobblemon.species.kyurem-black.desc: The sameness of Zekrom's and Kyurem's genes allowed Kyurem to absorb Zekrom. Kyurem can now use the power of both electricity and ice.
cobblemon.species.venusaur-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.charizard-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.blastoise-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.meowth-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.eevee-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.pikachu-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.butterfree-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-gmax.desc: Cream pours endlessly from this Pokémon’s body. The cream stiffens when compressed by an impact. A harder impact results in harder cream.
cobblemon.species.sandaconda-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.snorlax-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.cinderace-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.machamp-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.gengar-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.toxtricity-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically.
cobblemon.species.urshifu-gmax.desc: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically. The energy released by this Pokémon’s fists forms shock waves that can blow away Dynamax Pokémon in just one hit.
cobblemon.species.urshifu-rapidstrikegma: A Gigantamax phenomenon that makes this Pokémon distorts space to change its size while affecting the world around them while altering their appearance drastically. As it waits for the right moment to unleash its Gigantamax power, this Pokémon maintains a perfect one-legged stance. It won’t even twitch.
cobblemon.species.urshifu-rapidstrike.de: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in defeating foes by raining many blows down on them. Its strikes are nonstop, flowing like a river.
cobblemon.species.necrozma-ultra.desc: The light pouring out from all over its body affects living things and nature, impacting them in various ways.
cobblemon.species.zygarde-complete.desc: This is Zygarde’s perfected form. From the orifice on its chest, it radiates high-powered energy that eliminates everything.
cobblemon.species.darmanitan-zen.desc: When wounded, it stops moving. It goes as still as stone to meditate, sharpening its mind and spirit.
cobblemon.species.darmanitan-galarzen.de: Darmanitan takes this form when enraged. It won’t stop spewing flames until its rage has settled, even if its body starts to melt.
cobblemon.species.darmanitan-galar.desc: Though it has a gentle disposition, it’s also very strong. It will quickly freeze the snowball on its head before going for a headbutt.
cobblemon.species.dialga-origin.desc: Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a form bearing a striking resemblance to the creator Pokémon. Dialga now wields such colossal strength that one must conclude this is its true form.
cobblemon.species.palkia-origin.desc: It soars across the sky in a form that greatly resembles the creator of all things. Perhaps this imitation of appearance is Palkia’s strategy for gaining Arceus’s powers.
cobblemon.species.giratina-origin.desc: Giratina loses its legs upon changing into this form. I believe this Pokémon must hail from a world where the heavens and the earth are as one, though I have no way of proving it.
cobblemon.species.kyogre-primal.desc: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.
cobblemon.species.groudon-primal.desc: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.
cobblemon.species.ursaluna-bloodmoon.des: I believe it was Hisui’s swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat at will.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-rubycream.des: The moment it evolved, it took on a sweet and tart flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-matchacream.d: The cells that compose its cream fluctuated suddenly during evolution, giving the cream an aromatic flavor.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-mintcream.des: The moment it evolved, it took on a refreshing flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-lemoncream.de: The moment it evolved, it took on a sour flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-saltedcream.d: The moment it evolved, it took on a salty flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
cobblemon.species.alcremie-rubyswirl.des: The moment it evolved, it took on a mixed flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
The moment it evolved, it took on a bitter flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
The cells that compose its cream fluctuated suddenly during evolution, giving the cream a complex flavor.
cobblemon.species.eternatus-eternamax.de: Infinite amounts of energy pour from this Pokémon’s enlarged core, warping the surrounding space-time.
cobblemon.species.corviknight-gmax.desc: Imbued with Gigantamax energy, its wings can whip up winds more forceful than any a hurricane could muster. The gusts blow everything away.
cobblemon.species.melmetal-gmax.desc: In a distant land, there are legends about a cyclopean giant. In fact, the giant was a Melmetal that was flooded with Gigantamax energy.
cobblemon.species.rillaboom-gmax.desc: Gigantamax energy has caused Rillaboom’s stump to grow into a drum set that resembles a forest.
cobblemon.species.greninja-ash.desc: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
cobblemon.species.greninja-bond.desc: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
cobblemon.species.burmy-trash.desc: When confronted by a lack of other materials, Burmy will create its cloak using dust and refuse. The cloak seems to be more comfortable than one would think.
cobblemon.species.burmy-sandy.desc: It creates a cloak by weaving together sand, mud, and silk it has spat out. This earthen cloak is ruined by wind and rain, so the Pokémon hides away in caves and other such places.
cobblemon.battle.activate.terashell: %1$s made its shell gleam! It's distorting type matchups!
cobblemon.move.temperflare.desc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.
cobblemon.move.supercellslam.desc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.
cobblemon.move.alluringvoice.desc: 100% confuse target that had a stat rise this turn.
cobblemon.move.psychicnoise.desc: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from healing.
cobblemon.move.electroshot.desc: Raises Sp. Atk by 1, hits turn 2. Rain: no charge.
cobblemon.move.ficklebeam.desc: Has a 30% chance this move's power is doubled.
cobblemon.move.burningbulwark.desc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: burn.
cobblemon.move.thunderclap.desc: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.
cobblemon.move.tachyoncutter.desc: Hits twice. This move does not check accuracy.
cobblemon.move.terastarstorm.desc: Terapagos-Stellar: Stellar type, hits both foes.
cobblemon.move.hardpress.desc: More power the more HP the target has left.
cobblemon.move.dragoncheer.desc: Ally: Crit ratio +1, or +2 if ally is Dragon type.
